francisco javier arceo

  ·     ·   About Me  ·   Blog

Hello! My name is Francisco Javier Arceo, I'm a Data Scientist for the Decision Science Group at the Commonwealth Bank of Australia (CBA).

I was previously a graduate student at Columbia University in the City of New York studying Data Science where I focused my coursework on various forms of Machine Learning.

My specialties and interests are in statistics, econometrics, and machine learning. Feel free to checkout some of my projects on GitHub where you'll find some work I've done on Bayesian Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and other random things.
